channel.title: censorship on Joshua Rubin
channel.description: Recent content in censorship on Joshua Rubin

item.title: Censorship
item.description: The problem is not censorship. The problem is the oligopolistic show of force that we have allowed — and it was a problem some of us have foreseen. Had the people of this country held our politicians' feet to the fire to uphold antitrust regulation, there would be far more choice in the marketplace. We would not be in the position today. I’m, personally, not threatened nor surprised that these private companies have this power/ability — it’s in their terms of service and I knew what I was getting into.
